title: अमेरिकी वैज्ञानिक ने न कोरोना वायरस बनाया और न ही चीन को बेचा, फ़र्ज़ी खबर हो रही वायरल
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: USA just discovered the man who manufactured and sold the Corona virus to China. Dr Charles Lieber, head of the chemistry and biology department at Havard University, USA. He was just arrested today according to American department sources.
